title: Anata No Koisuru Kirai Na Watashi
alternative_title: 這樣的我可以墜入愛河嗎 ; 这样的我可以坠入爱河吗 ; あなたの恋する 嫌いなわたし
status: 這樣的我可以墜入愛河嗎 ; 这样的我可以坠入爱河吗 ; あなたの恋する 嫌いなわたし
description:
Description :
        A confession from the boss with a secret longing. The passionate gaze and tender, loving caresses. It's like a dream... but maybe it's not me whom he loves.Saki was once bullied because of her appearance, but she has improved her makeup skills and is now a glamorous beauty. The men in her offices make advances, and although some of her co-workers gossip about her being fliratious, she is still able to do her best everyday because of her boss, Director Banshou, who approves of her work ethics. One night, when she was out without makeup because she was close to her home, her boss approaches her and confesses his feelings for her! He didn't seem to realize that it was his subordinate, Saki.What does it mean? Is he mistaking me for someone else? This is a supreme melodrama between two adults who cross paths.
